page.title: 03SIXHILLS _ FARMING & CHURCH
page.content: FARMING _ 4 Farms. 2 Arable & 2 Mixed. At Manor Farm Sheep & Cattle on 250 acres of permanent pasture on Wolds slopes and 500 arable. Crops _ Winter Barley 150 acres, Oil Seed Rape 90 acres and remainer Winter Wheat. 300 Breeding Sheep produce about 500 lambs born in March, fattened & sold in Dec. Single Suckling Beef Herd of 30 Lincs. Red Cows serviced by Charolais Bull produce 30 calves which are fattened in second year and sold. Staffing is Farmer & 2 sons, one employee and wives helping out at busy times. Very much a family affair. PARISH CHURCH of All Saints is in Bark _with Group of 5 Parishes which have Sunday services in turn, each support_ ing the other to that congregations 30 Church built in 1870 on site of earl_ ier building & 3 bells dated 1320,1450 & 1820. Methodist Chapel now a store.
